subject: Records and Achievements
Pole Vault
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The French pole-vaulter Renaud Lavillenie broke Sergei Bubka’s nearly 21-year-old world record at an indoor meet in Donetsk, Ukraine, with Bubka, 50, watching from the stands.
snippet: The French pole-vaulter Renaud Lavillenie broke Sergei Bubka’s nearly 21-year-old world record at an indoor meet in Donetsk, Ukraine, with Bubka, 50, watching from the stands.
